news.headline: Gold futures break through $2,900/ounce mark, hitting record high.
Zachary's Daiquiris to open on Feb 28, 2025 at King St and Anne St in Charleston, SC by Republic Hospitality.
news.summary: In a thrilling announcement, Republic Hospitality revealed that Zachary's Daiquiris will debut on February 28, 2025, at the bustling intersection of King Street and Anne Street in the heart of Charleston, South Carolina. This innovative venture is set to revolutionize...

news.headline: TotalEnergies' Q4 result beats expectations with adjusted EPS at $1.90 & sales of $52.51B. Significant growth in LNG & hydrocarbons expected for 2025.
news.summary: TotalEnergies SE (NYSE:TTE) stock is up today following the release of its fourth-quarter financial results. The company reported an adjusted EPS of $1.90, surpassing the expected $1.84. Sales for the quarter amounted to $52.51 billion, exceeding the anticipated $42.77 billion. Hydrocarbon production saw a 1% increase Q/Q, reaching 2,427 kboe/d, resulting in a total production of 2,434 kboe/d in 2024. Exploration & Production experienced a 1% Q/Q decrease in production, while Integrated LNG businesses saw a 6% Q/Q growth. Adjusted operating income dropped by 7% Q/Q to $2.31 billion in Exploration & Production, but rose by 35% Q/Q to $1.43 billion in Integrated LNG.

news.headline: Cencora's Q1 2025 earnings show revenue increased to $81.5 billion (+12.8%) with EPS of $3.73 (+13.7%), driven by sales of obesity drugs and specialty medicines.
news.summary: Cencora, Inc (NYSE:COR) announced that in the first quarter of 2025, their sales rose by 12.8% to $81.5 billion, surpassing the expected $78.38 billion. This growth was primarily driven by the U.S. Healthcare Solutions segment, which saw a revenue increase of 13.6% to $74 billion. The rise in sales was attributed to market expansion, particularly in the GLP-1 class with products for diabetes and weight loss, as well as the sale of specialty products to healthcare providers. The company's adjusted earnings per share (EPS) also saw an increase to $3.73, up by 13.7% compared to the previous year, exceeding the anticipated $3.50. Additionally, Cencora recently acquired the Retina Care Practice Network for $4.6 billion, and with better than expected Q4 earnings, they have raised their dividend. For more details, the full article is accessible on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Europe criticized for slow deployment of troops and arms, facing challenges in quick response.
Female soccer players secure $5 million state settlement for abuse case.
Norwood Medical partners with ENGIE for 5-year renewable wind energy contract, enhancing sustainability.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Norwood Medical LLC based in Dayton, Ohio and ENGIE Resources LLC, a subsidiary of ENGIE North America, entered a five-year renewable energy contract. This partnership will supply Norwood Medical's headquarters with renewable wind energy from ENGIE.

news.headline: UAE President Mohamed bin Zayed patronizes Zayed Award ceremony, honoring 2025 recipients. Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed attends.
news.summary: In Abu Dhabi, UAE on February 5, 2025, an event was held under the patronage of His Highness Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, President of the United Arab Emirates. His Highness Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs and International, also attended the event.

news.headline: Dubai Fountain, world's largest, to close for 5 months starting in May, for upgrade and enhancement.
news.summary: Scheduled to begin in May, the world-renowned Dubai Fountain, located at Downtown Dubai, will be closed for a period of five months for a comprehensive upgrade and routine maintenance. Emaar made the announcement on February 5, 2025. The Dubai Fountain is known as the largest performing fountain globally and attracts millions of visitors annually.

news.headline: Skanska USA launches Skanska Advanced Technology focusing on high-tech sector with 180+ employees.
news.summary: Skanska USA, a prominent construction and development company, has introduced Skanska Advanced Technology (SAT), a specialized unit concentrating on high-tech and semiconductor manufacturing. Under the leadership of Executive Vice President and General Manager Katie Coulson, part of the USA Building division, SAT has over 180 professionals. The unit's projects extend across Oregon, Arizona, and California, reflecting Skanska’s commitment to this growing sector. Collaborating closely within the company, SAT aims to further enhance its presence in the advanced technology field.

news.headline: New York Times beat Q4 earnings with 80 cents EPS, missed sales at $726.6 million. Gained 350,000 net digital-only subscribers, total now 11.43 million. Digital subscription revenues up 16.0%.
news.summary: Shares of the New York Times Company (NYSE:NYT) are down in premarket trading on Wednesday following their reported fourth-quarter earnings. The company exceeded expectations with adjusted earnings per share at 80 cents, surpassing the estimated 74 cents. However, quarterly sales fell short at $726.6 million compared to the anticipated $726.65 million. The company saw a gain of 350,000 net digital-only subscribers, bringing the total to 11.43 million. The digital-only average revenue per user (ARPU) also increased by 4.4% to $9.65, attributed to price hikes and subscriber shifts. Digital subscription revenues rose by 16.0%, while digital advertising revenues grew by 9.5%. Overall, total subscription revenues increased by 8.4%.

news.headline: Ford to report Q4 results on Feb. 5, 2025. Expected earnings at 33 cents/share and revenue $43.25B. Ford shares closed at $10.16.
news.summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) is scheduled to release its Q4 financial results on Wednesday, February 5, 2025, after the market closes. Analysts predict earnings per share to be 33 cents, an increase from 29 cents in the same period last year. Ford anticipates quarterly revenue to reach $43.25 billion, compared to $43.21 billion a year ago. The company has surpassed revenue expectations in 2 of the last 10 quarters and beat earnings per share estimates in 5 of the past 10 quarters. On Tuesday, Ford's stock price closed at $10.16, up 2.7%. For more details and analyst ratings, visit Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Car IQ and Visa release whitepaper on vehicle-based fleet payments for increased security, efficiency, and cost savings.
news.summary: In San Francisco, tech company Car IQ and Visa have released a whitepaper highlighting the benefits of vehicle-based payments. The report, titled "Cardless Fleet Payments: How Car IQ is Re-Inventing the Fleet Payment Process," explores the advantages of this new approach in terms of security, efficiency, and cost savings for fleet operations. Traditionally, fleet cards have been the primary payment method for many years, but they often involve high expenses.

news.headline: Holland America Line partners with The HISTORY Channel for exclusive historically focused itineraries, shore excursions.
news.summary: In the coming three years, a groundbreaking partnership between Holland America Line and A+E's The HISTORY Channel™ aims to enhance the historical experience for guests globally both on board and on land. Announced in Seattle on February 5, 2025, this unique collaboration will revolutionize the way history is presented to travelers, promising an unparalleled exploration of the past.

news.headline: Lytx introduces Safe Driving Report & Trend Dashboard to promote driver safety & recognize achievements. Feb 5, 2025.
news.summary: Lytx® Inc., a global leader in video safety and video telematics, revealed that they have introduced The Safe Driving Report and Safe Driving Trend Dashboard. These new features aim to assist fleets in acknowledging exceptional drivers, incentivizing safety practices, and achieving positive outcomes in San Diego. The announcement was made on February 5, 2025, and underscores the company's commitment to enhancing road safety. Both tools have been developed to provide valuable insights for fleet managers, leveraging data to reinforce safe driving behaviors. Such initiatives are essential in reinforcing a culture of safety among drivers.

news.headline: Balcones Distilling and The Other Art Fair renew partnership to showcase emerging art in LA and Brooklyn.
news.summary: Balcones Distilling, a Texas company recognized as a pioneer in the recently established American Single Malt sector, collaborates with The Other Art Fair in Los Angeles and Brooklyn to honor the distinctive viewpoints of emerging artists. The partnership continues to showcase the connection between art and spirits. The event, scheduled for Feb. 5, 2025, in Waco, Texas, underscores Balcones Distilling's commitment to supporting talent and creativity. This initiative marks another successful collaboration as Balcones Distilling continues to lead the way in the industry.

news.headline: Southwire to open new 1.2 million sqft distribution center in Bremen, GA, serving as shipping hub.
news.summary: Southwire has revealed plans to build a state-of-the-art distribution center spanning over 1.2 million square feet in Bremen, Georgia. Expected to become a central hub for shipping and distribution, the facility is set to bolster Southwire's operational capacity significantly. This large-scale construction project signifies the company's commitment to expanding its logistical infrastructure.

news.headline: Proteus and Pathway partner for private investment access platform; Leading alternative and private markets investing firms collaborate.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Proteus, LLC, a prominent alternative investment platform, revealed its partnership with Pathway Capital Management, LP, a top player in private markets investing. This collaboration brings a new private investment opportunity to the market.

news.headline: ECB's Centeno: Pretty clear, we need to keep downward trajectory of interest rates.
ECB's Centeno: Europe must be united in face of potential tariffs; I see negotiations ahead.
ECB's Centeno: I'm ok with gradual rate cuts of 25 bps.
State revenue growth slows after pandemic stimulus, stable credit outlook for most states. Budget cuts of 6% expected.
news.summary: In Boston, Morgan Stanley Investment Management (MSIM) unveiled the 12th annual State of the States Report, revealing a deceleration in revenue growth following a rapid increase over the past two years due to pandemic-induced government aid. The report's State of the States Analysis suggests a steady credit forecast for the majority of states, with several anticipating budget reductions of around 6% in the upcoming fiscal year. Craig Brandon, co-head of Municipal Investment at MSIM, emphasized these trends in the report.

news.headline: NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) to report full year & Q4 2024 financial results on Feb 26, 2025 at 9:00 a.m. EST. Press release & webcast to be available on NRG website.
news.summary: Houston-based NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is set to announce its financial performance for the full year and fourth quarter of 2024 on Wednesday, February 26, 2025. The management will discuss the results in a conference call and webcast scheduled for 9:00 a.m. EST (8:00 a.m. CST). Prior to the call, a press release detailing the financial outcomes will be issued by the company. This information will also be accessible on NRG's official website at www.nrg.com. The live webcast and presentation materials will accompany the discussion.

news.headline: ECB's Centeno: Undershooting 2% inflation is a risk if investment doesn't pick up.
ECB's Centeno: We may need to go below neutral rate to sustain inflation at 2%.
Good Greek Moving & Storage has recovered and transported 107,000 pounds of food in under 20 months to help national hunger relief.
news.summary: In less than 20 months, the recipient of the 2024 National Mover of the Year award from Jupiter, Florida recovered and delivered more than 107,000 pounds of food to aid national hunger relief efforts. Good Greek Moving and Storage, known as the World's First and Only Total, accomplished this feat.

news.headline: Cra-Z-Art acquires Joker AG, becoming world's largest multi-compound manufacturer for kids. Feb. 5, 2025 in Randolph, NJ.
news.summary: A notable development occurred in Randolph, NJ on February 5, 2025, as Cra-Z-Art, a prominent U.S. company specializing in toys, activities, art, and school supplies, revealed its acquisition of Joker AG. This strategic move has resulted in the formation of the biggest global manufacturer of multi-compounds. Prior to this acquisition, Cra-Z-Art was already well-established in the industry.

news.headline: Doceree launches admanager, a unified platform for healthcare publishers. It is the first of its kind in the industry.
news.summary: In Short Hills, New Jersey, on February 5, 2025, Doceree unveiled admanager, a comprehensive ad management platform tailored for healthcare publishers. This launch marks a significant milestone for Doceree, the pioneering global network of physician-only platforms for programmatic messaging. Designed to enhance advertising capabilities, admanager offers a range of powerful tools for healthcare publishers seeking to elevate their marketing efforts.

news.headline: Blind Squirrel Games sets up Colombia studio, investing in tech and talent. Expanding global reach. Los Angeles, Feb 5, 2025.
news.summary: Blind Squirrel Games, a leading video game development studio known for hit titles including Bioshock The..., has announced its expansion to enhance support for publishers worldwide. The studio is investing in cutting-edge game development technology and talent to further solidify its global presence. This move comes on the heels of notable achievements and through strategic planning for growth. The expansion aims to meet the increasing demand in the industry and provide top-notch services to meet the needs of developers and publishers.

news.headline: Pittco Management invests in RepScrubs through special entity managed by Rockmont Partners.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Pittco Management, LLC made an equity investment in Prescient Logistics LLC, known as RepScrubs, through a special purpose entity operated by Rockmont Partners Management, LLC. The investment is part of a partnership that aims to enhance RepScrubs' operations and growth in the logistics sector. No specific investment amount was disclosed in the announcement.

news.headline: International Motors honored 2024 Dealers of the Year at annual meeting in Phoenix, Arizona.
news.summary: In Phoenix on February 5, 2025, International Motors, LLC revealed the recipients of the International and IC Bus Dealer of the Year awards during their yearly dealer gathering. The dealers were recognized based on several criteria, with the event taking place in Phoenix, Arizona.

news.headline: DocuSign introduces Notary On-Demand for remote online notarization, boosting security for businesses. SF, Feb. 5, 2025. #DocuSign #NotaryOnDemand
news.summary: Docusign, a prominent technology company traded under the ticker symbol DOCU, has announced the introduction of Notary On-Demand on February 5, 2025, in San Francisco. This innovative service provides immediate access to notaries through remote online notarization. The solution aims to bolster security measures and cater to the needs of businesses and their clients.

news.headline: Autism Society of Southeastern Wisconsin rebrands as Autism United of Wisconsin, aiming to expand services statewide.
news.summary: Autism United of Wisconsin (AUW) has recently rebranded from the Autism Society of Southeastern Wisconsin (ASSEW) as a not-for-profit organization. The aim of AUW is to broaden its reach to all 72 counties in the state. This transition marks a significant step in expanding their efforts beyond the southeastern region. The move comes as part of a strategic initiative to increase their impact and support for individuals with autism across Wisconsin, signaling a commitment to serving a wider community.

news.headline: Lightning AI's new AI hub offers DeepSeek R1 for secure deployment on private enterprise clouds, enabling no-code APIs for AI models with zero setup.
news.summary: Lightning AI, the creators of PyTorch Lightning and Lightning, have introduced no-code APIs for deploying AI models, systems, and private containers without any setup required. With zero setup involved, users can now deploy AI models and systems as APIs, ensuring enterprise-grade reliability and security. This innovation was announced in New York on February 5, 2025, showcasing Lightning AI's commitment to simplifying the deployment process.

news.headline: FLASH named Bill Read 2025 National Weatherperson of the Year, honoring former National Hurricane Center Director.
news.summary: Today in Tallahassee, Florida, the Federal Alliance for Safe Homes (FLASH) honored Bill Read, the former Director of the National Hurricane Center, with the prestigious Lifetime Achievement Award. The recognition was announced on February 5, 2025, highlighting Read's exceptional contributions to hurricane forecasting and safety. This award is given annually to exceptional individuals in the field, and Read was selected as the recipient for the year 2025.

news.headline: Samsung Electro-Mechanics introduces world's first MLCC for LiDAR with 2.2uF capacity in 1005 size - key for autonomous driving.
news.summary: Samsung Electro-Mechanics is enhancing its automotive Multilayer Ceramic Capacitors (MLCC) with the introduction of a revolutionary 2.2uF high-capacity model, showcasing remarkable reliability and the highest voltage capabilities in a 1005 size globally. This advancement is crucial for the LiDAR technology, which is a vital component in autonomous driving systems. Samsung Electro-Mechanics aims to meet the evolving needs of the automotive industry by expanding its MLCC range, providing cutting-edge solutions for next-generation vehicles.

news.headline: Rolando Bonilla, Chief Strategy Officer at Voler Strategic Advisors, awarded Silicon Valley Business Journal's Latino Business Leadership Award among 11 individuals and 3 companies.
news.summary: In San Jose, California on February 5, 2025, Rolando Bonilla, the Chief Strategy Officer at Voler Strategic Advisors, has been honored with the Latino Business Leadership Award by the Silicon Valley Business Journal. This award is part of an annual recognition program that acknowledges outstanding individuals and companies in various fields, with a total of 11 individuals and three companies being recognized this year.

news.headline: Slots content on YouTube sees a surge with over 2 billion views in 2024. Influencers setting subscriber records.
news.summary: According to recent data from SlotsFan.com, a reputable casino slots influencer platform, there has been a notable increase in interest in slots content. The statistics highlight a remarkable growth in subscribers on YouTube, setting new records for the platform. This surge in popularity reflects the rising trend of engaging with slots-related media. The data indicates a substantial boost in viewership numbers, emphasizing the widespread appeal of casino slots content among online audiences. The insights suggest a growing fascination with slot games and related influencer content, shaping the digital landscape of entertainment.

news.headline: Private capital lawyer Jerome McCluskey joins Latham & Watkins LLP on Feb. 5, 2025; specializes in leveraged finance.
news.summary: Jerome McCluskey, who has extensive experience in advising on intricate leveraged finance and private credit transactions, has joined Latham & Watkins LLP in New York as a partner on February 5, 2025. The firm is delighted to welcome him aboard, bringing with him a wealth of knowledge from his background in both in-house and private practice settings.

news.headline: Fyle integrates with QuickBooks Desktop for syncing employee expenses, facilitating accurate coding. Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: Fyle has announced a new integration that enables accountants to seamlessly sync employee expenses to QuickBooks Desktop. This integration, unveiled in Newark, Delaware on February 5, 2025, aims to streamline the process of coding expenses accurately and facilitating quicker book closure. Fyle, known as an efficient expense management platform, is offering this integration to enhance the workflow for businesses using their services. With this new feature, users can expect a more efficient and error-free way of managing employee expenses, ultimately improving their financial tracking capabilities.

news.headline: WellHive partners with Grow Therapy to enhance mental healthcare for veterans, leading care tech and provider network join forces.
news.summary: In Melbourne, Florida, on February 5, 2025, WellHive, a top care navigation technology for the Federal government, disclosed a recent collaboration with Grow Therapy, the primary mental health provider network in the country. This partnership aims to integrate real-time solutions to enhance the overall mental health services provided.

news.headline: US services sector growth slows in January 2025, Services PMI fell to 52.8% (down from 54% in Dec), reflecting tariff concerns.
news.summary: The U.S. services sector saw continued growth in January 2025, but at a slower rate than expected. The Services PMI fell to 52.8% from 54% in December, below the forecasted 54.3%. The slowdown is attributed to rising costs and uncertainty around trade policies, particularly tariffs. Despite this, all four key subindexes—Business Activity, New Orders, Employment, and Supplier Deliveries—remained in expansion territory for the second consecutive month in January. Concerns over tariffs are prominent, with industry participants citing higher price pressures and worries about potential U.S. government tariff actions. Contacts in professional, scientific, and technical services as well as real estate, rental, and leasing sectors expressed apprehensions regarding tariffs impacting their businesses.

news.headline: ACCP outlines guidelines for appropriate use of GLP-1 receptor agonists for obesity, crucial due to rising prevalence.
news.summary: In Ashburn, Virginia, on February 5, 2025, the American College of Clinical Pharmacology® (ACCP) released a Position Paper titled "Ensuring the Proper Use of Glucagon-Like Peptide-1 Receptor Agonists." This paper highlights the challenges associated with obesity, a complex condition that is becoming more common. According to the paper, the prevalence of obesity is on the rise, with an increasing number of individuals affected by this multifaceted disease. The ACCP's Position Paper aims to address the appropriate usage of Glucagon-Like Peptide-1 Receptor Agonists in managing obesity.

news.headline: Digital Harmonic receives investment from Caladan Capital led by Victor L. Vescovo, experienced private investor, to drive growth and innovation.
news.summary: In Columbia, Maryland, Digital Harmonic, a prominent company specializing in advanced video, signal, and image processing technologies, has recently disclosed a significant strategic investment from Caladan Capital. The investment is spearheaded by Victor L. Vescovo, a seasoned private investor boasting of more than three decades of expertise in defense, aerospace, and electronics sectors. This financial backing is poised to propel Digital Harmonic's expansion and groundbreaking initiatives throughout a variety of verticals, such as Media & Entertainment, Healthcare, and Natio.

news.headline: FirstBank had a strong Q4 with a record-setting Colorado Gives Day, continuing its Give It Forward initiative.
news.summary: The bank is actively participating in giving back to the community through Colorado Gives Day. Furthermore, they are expanding their instant payment services to benefit more customers. This initiative showcases the bank's commitment to charity and technological advancement.

news.headline: NeuroOne® will report Q1 FY 2025 financial results on Feb 12, 2025 at 8:30 am ET - Eden Prairie company on NASDAQ: NMTC.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Eden Prairie, Minnesota, NeuroOne Medical Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: NMTC) announced that they will be disclosing the financial results for the fiscal first quarter ending on December 31, 2024. This medical technology company aims to enhance surgical treatment choices and results for individuals with neurological conditions. The report is set to be published before the market opens on February 12, 2025.

news.headline: Vishay Intertechnology unveils new 60mm inductive position sensor for industrial apps, offers high precision, lower latency.
news.summary: The RAIK060 encoder is designed for use near electrical motors, offering a slim and lightweight alternative to magnetic-based encoders. With increased rotational speed and reduced latency time, the RAIK060 provides improved performance.

news.headline: loanDepot and Onx Homes form joint venture, Onx X+ Mortgage, for new homebuyers in Florida and Texas.(Numbers: loanDepot - NYSE: "LDI")
news.summary: A collaboration between loanDepot, Inc. (NYSE: "LDI") and Onx Homes has been unveiled, introducing the Onx X+ Mortgage in Florida and Texas. This joint venture aims to offer a simplified financing option for new homebuyers by combining the expertise of both companies in utilizing technology to enhance the home buying experience. Onx X+ Mortgage is set to cater to individuals in these states looking to embark on homeownership, reflecting a strategic partnership between these industry leaders.

news.headline: Spokesperson: We will take all possible actions to defend legitimate interests, including considering taking up matters in WTO - Xinhua.
Michael Saylor teases '₿ig Strategy Day' as Bitcoin reserve odds fall on Kalshi to 58% from a peak of 68.5% in January. Government considering Bitcoin inclusion in sovereign wealth fund.
news.summary: A discussion about setting up a strategic reserve of Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) is underway, with 'Crypto Czar' David Sacks making it a top priority for the digital assets committee. However, the likelihood of this reserve being established by 2025 has decreased from 68.5% in January to 58% according to prediction market site Kalshi. Sacks mentioned at a press conference that the potential inclusion of Bitcoin in a new sovereign wealth fund would be overseen by Howard Lutnick, the upcoming Secretary of Commerce. Meanwhile, Michael Saylor, the executive chairman of MicroStrategy (NASDAQ:MSTR), generated buzz by sharing his thoughts on the matter on social media.
